mapper.select: SELECT notice_num, notice_name, notice_option, notice_count, notice_date FROM NOTICE ORDER BY notice_num desc

SELECT notice_num, notice_name, CASE WHEN notice_option = '01' THEN '공지사항' WHEN notice_option = '02' THEN '배송안내' WHEN notice_option = '03' THEN '기획전' END AS notice_option, notice_content FROM NOTICE WHERE notice_num = #{noticeNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE ( notice_num, notice_name, notice_option, notice_content, notice_date ) VALUES ( noticenum_seq.NEXTVAL, #{noticeName}, #{noticeOption}, #{noticeContent}, sysdate )
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET notice_name = #{noticeName}, notice_option = #{noticeOption}, notice_content = #{noticeContent} WHERE notice_num = #{noticeNum}
